europeana:record.dc:title: One new genus and seven new species of Rogadinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) from Vietnam
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Long K.D.
Achterberg, van C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Braconidae
Rogadinae
Vietorogas
new genus
Cornutorogas
Megarhogas
new species
Vietnam
europeana:record.dc:description: One new genus of the tribe Rogadini Foerster, 1862 (Braconidae: Rogadinae) from Vietnam: Vietorogas Long & van Achterberg, gen. nov. (type species: Vietorogas bachma spec. nov.) is described. In addition, seven new species are described and illustrated: Vietorogas abditivus Long & van Achterberg, spec. nov.; V. bachma Long, spec. nov.; Cornutorogas aurantius van Achterberg, spec. nov., C. hatinhensis Long & van Achterberg, spec. nov.; C. hoabinhicus Long & van Achterberg, spec. nov.; C. similis Long, spec. nov. and Megarhogas albapiculatus Long, spec. nov.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: One new genus and seven new species of Rogadinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) from Vietnam (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 82) (Issue 32)
